price: 30. Vertrek jullie naar een schaduw in drie kolommen.
arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ ظِلّٖ ذِي ثَلَٰثِ شُعَبٖ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: inṭaliqū ilā ẓillin dhī thalāthi shuʿabin
